title: [Large-Scale] Digital Literacy and Language Proficiency Improvement Program for Vulnerable Migrant Students

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage proficiency and daily-life level language proficiency
context.additional_context: A program emphasizing practical competency development for adapting to university environments and local communities, combining self-directed online learning with face-to-face sessions.

learning_goals: Learners can effectively engage with university lecture content by utilizing academic reading, writing, listening, and speaking skills.
Learners can independently search, evaluate, and utilize information required for academic and social activities using digital tools (collaboration platforms, content creation tools, etc.).
Learners can establish and implement self-directed learning plans using Open Educational Resources (OER).

resources: Digital Literacy and Academic Language Textbook

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
